price: ߊ߲ ߞߊ߬ ߡߎߛߊ߫ ߗߋ߫ ߒ߬ ߠߊ߫ ߡߊ߲߬ߕߊߣߌ߲ ߠߎ߬ ߣߌ߫ ߘߊ߬ߟߎ߫ ߓߟߋ߬ߓߟߋ ߟߋ߬ ߘߌ߫
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَا مُوسَىٰ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا وَسُلۡطَٰنٖ مُّبِينٍ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: walaqad arsalnā mūsā biāyātinā wasul'ṭānin mubīnin
